Key Match Events: Spencer Strider pitched seven innings of four-hit, one-run ball for his majors-leading 17th win
Austin Riley hit a two-run homer in the first inning and added a sacrifice fly in the third
Kevin Pillar added an RBI double in the fourth
Pre-Game Insights: This marks the Braves’ sixth consecutive NL East crown
Atlanta improves to 96-50 on the season — the best record in the majors
The Braves won 28 of 33 games from May 31 to July 8 to build a 9 1/2-game lead
Post-Match Reflections: The Braves clinched in their 146th game, the second-earliest date for the Braves to clinch since the divisional era began in 1969
The Braves have been not just the class of the division, but arguably of the NL and all of baseball, building the sport’s best record
The Braves would have to win a division series and NLCS before they could try to win a second World Series title in three years
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies haven’t been in the division race since May
The Phillies need to win some games to secure home-field advantage for that best-of-three Wild Card series
